name: Moving Day (itch) (L3mon)
description:
It is time to move on to a whole new house! Help the movers by taking your stuff outside as quickly as possible!

Controls:

  • Click and drag to move around objects
  • [F11] to toggle full-screen mode on/off
  • [ESC] to exit

Created by L3mon, graphics by Riden. Thank you FreeSound.org for providing the sounds for the game!

This game was made under 48 hours and was a submission for the Pizza Jam, organized by computerjames (09/02/2018)
